quality_assessment: Documentation is comprehensive, accurate, and well-structured with honest implementation status. Minor line number references slightly outdated due to code changes.

issues.description: Router.rs reference says lines 199-234 but template routing is at lines 190-212
Page does not use MkDocs Material visual features like admonitions, code annotations, or content tabs for better readability
issues.fix_suggestion: Convert blockquote warnings to proper admonitions (e.g., !!! warning), add tabbed interface for CLI examples, add code annotations for complex YAML snippets

positive_aspects: Comprehensive and honest implementation status section with clear icons (✅, ⏳, ❌)
Excellent structure with clear progression from overview to specific features
Good use of source code references linking documentation to actual implementation
Detailed implementation roadmap with phased approach
Clear 'What to Avoid' section preventing user frustration
Well-documented CLI commands with practical examples
Cross-references to related pages (template-system.md, workflow-extension-inheritance.md, etc.)
improvement_suggestions: Convert blockquote warnings/notes to proper MkDocs Material admonitions for better visual hierarchy
Add code annotations to complex YAML examples to explain each field
Consider adding a tabbed interface for CLI command examples (register vs list vs show)
Add a quick-start example at the top for users who want to try templates immediately
Update line count references to match current source file sizes
Consider adding a comparison table showing which features work in each execution mode

metadata.validation_focus: Auto-discovered page - check for drift and enhance with visual features
